Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 16th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1984...
Released by Los Angeles on 3/2/1984...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 2/1/1985 to a 6-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Released by Chicago (N) on 6/16/1985...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 6/16/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 7/9/1985 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
